document_data.name: Infernexus
document_data.mainbody: '''Infernexus''' was a young [[red dragon]] in [[Stardock]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Infernexus was the youngest son of [[Ashtyrranthor]] and brother of [[Ashranthax]], [[Blazutranc]], [[Meteoranzym]], [[Smoakcant]], and [[Zolcharrx]].
document_data.Activities: Infernexus was usually inside his lair in Stardock.
document_data.Personality: Infernexus felt miserable inside Stardock. In truth, he wanted to abandon the [[githyanki]] and carve for himself a lair inside the [[Twisted Caverns]] of [[Undermountain]] but his mother forced him to remain there and help the githyanki. He was even ready to plot with adventurers to cause Ashtyrranthor's death.
